data.eml:eml: A new species of Melithaea (Anthozoa, Octocorallia, Melithaeidae) from the Oman Sea, off Oman

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Samimi-Namin, Kaveh, van Ofwegen, Leen P., McFadden, Catherine S. (2016): A new species of Melithaea (Anthozoa, Octocorallia, Melithaeidae) from the Oman Sea, off Oman. ZooKeys 623: 15-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.623.10045, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.623.10045
